version_description:
- Christmas event
- Added new unit: infantry
- New chapter missions
- Fixed some bugs

- Christmas event
- Added new unit: infantry
- New chapter missions
- Fixed some bugs

- New character cowgirl Lilith debuts
- Added Soviet camp to select
- Zone news system upgraded
- Improved the chapter missions
- Fixed some bugs

- New character cowgirl Lilith debuts
- Added Soviet camp to select
- Zone news system upgraded
- Improved the chapter missions
- Fixed some bugs

1. City Area Function Adjustments
- Player bases cannot be teleported into a City area now.
- Guild that occupies a City will obtain the highest boosts immediately. You don't need to occupy all tiles within the City area anymore.
- Guild Forts and Towers cannot be built in a City area.
- When Guild Forts and Towers are connected to a City area, and the Guild can initiate rally attacks to occupy the City.
2. Added a Hold Position option after defeating Invaders.
3. Added a new feature where your Action Point cost will be reduced when you march on Invaders after continuously defeating Invaders on the map.
4. Adjusted Officer Jessica's 4th skill
- Jessica's 4th skill changed into: When troop Health is below 60%, the troop's active skill damage will be increased by 40%, and the March Speed will be increased by 10%.
5. New characters in the Officer Club
- Jessica, Riven, Angelica, and Lilith have joined the Officer Club.
6. Optimized avatar display effects when Officers cast skills.
7. Lowered the the ratio of seriously wounded units in PvE battles.
8. Building Bubble Icon Optimization
- Now you can check resource accumulation progress on the bubble icons.
- Optimized display effects when you collect resources.

1. City Area Function Adjustments
- Player bases cannot be teleported into a City area now.
- Guild that occupies a City will obtain the highest boosts immediately. You don't need to occupy all tiles within the City area anymore.
- Guild Forts and Towers cannot be built in a City area.
- When Guild Forts and Towers are connected to a City area, and the Guild can initiate rally attacks to occupy the City.
2. Added a Hold Position option after defeating Invaders.
3. Added a new feature where your Action Point cost will be reduced when you march on Invaders after continuously defeating Invaders on the map.
4. Adjusted Officer Jessica's 4th skill
- Jessica's 4th skill changed into: When troop Health is below 60%, the troop's active skill damage will be increased by 40%, and the March Speed will be increased by 10%.
5. New characters in the Officer Club
- Jessica, Riven, Angelica, and Lilith have joined the Officer Club.
6. Optimized avatar display effects when Officers cast skills.
7. Lowered the the ratio of seriously wounded units in PvE battles.
8. Building Bubble Icon Optimization
- Now you can check resource accumulation progress on the bubble icons.
- Optimized display effects when you collect resources.

1. Increase officer rank
-The rank of officers was raised from Lv.50 to Lv.60
2. Added new campaign-NORMANDY ARENA
3. Added battle pass in the Zone News
4. Chance to get a buff after defeating Redwolf Legion
5. Added new country - Germany
6. Novice guide optimization
7. Added button ‘Officer Notice’ in 'Settings-General'

1. New Character comes up - Angel
2. New training queue expansion items added
3. Overview list - You can quickly and easily to check your base data
4. Arena battle scene replay function
5. Able to create 2 characters per server
6. Wardrobe interface UI optimization
7. Level up and star upgrade will limit each other
8. Provide EULA agreement and added blocking or filtering functions for the objectionable content.

1、New hero - Angel
2、New training queue expansion items added
3、Overview list added

6、Able to create 2 characters per server
7、Nationality will be displayed for each hero

1、New hero - Angel
2、New training queue expansion items added
3、Overview list added
4、Arena playback feature added
5、New war bond class added
6、Able to create 2 characters per server
7、Nationality will be displayed for each hero
8、Wardrobe interface optimization
9、Level up and star upgrade will limit each other

1. New war zone transfer functions
- war zone transfer can be realized after the server reaches a certain number of days
- Qualified novice players can perform war zone transfers
2. The mayor's authority change - The mayor will have more authority
3. New defeat system - you may receive some compensation when defeated by an attack
4. Arena and Guild interface optimization

1. New war zone transfer functions
- war zone transfer can be realized after the server reaches a certain number of days
- Qualified novice players can perform war zone transfers
2. The mayor's authority change - The mayor will have more authority
3. New defeat system - you may receive some compensation when defeated by an attack
4. Arena and Guild interface optimization

1. Added new Officer - Loubna
2. Added Lilith's new Outfits - Western Detective and Pigtails Killer
3. Increased personal rewards obtained in the Operation Falcon. Reduced rewards obtained from Guild Chests.
4. Now you can select all when using items.
5. Lowered the troop loss ratio needed for triggering the compensation when defeated (20% > 10%)

1. Added new Officer - Loubna
2. Added Lilith's new Outfits - Western Detective and Pigtails Killer
3. Increased personal rewards obtained in the Operation Falcon. Reduced rewards obtained from Guild Chests.
4. Now you can select all when using items.
5. Lowered the troop loss ratio needed for triggering the compensation when defeated (20% > 10%)

1. Raiders of the Treasure is now online.
- Guilds with a total combat power in the server’s top 20 can participate after being registered by the guild leader
2. The Recruitment Center can use up to 100 recruitment ticket at once.
3. Feature for Apple ID and Google account binding
4. Added Red Wolf Buff:
- Improved unit defense
- Improved training speed
- Improved resource collection speed
- Increased yield for all types of collection
- Increased resource output
- Improved action recovery speed
- Improved research speed
5. New battle levels
- Campaign level was raised to 60
6. Falcon reward mechanics modified
- Rewards are no longer received by email but directly added. The rewards are added directly to the backpack and can be viewed there.
7. Optimization of chat interface
8. Voice-over update for officers

1. Raiders of the Treasure is now online.
- Guilds with a total combat power in the server’s top 20 can participate after being registered by the guild leader
2. The Recruitment Center can use up to 100 recruitment ticket at once.
3. Feature for Apple ID and Google account binding
4. Added Red Wolf Buff:
- Improved unit defense
- Improved training speed
- Improved resource collection speed
- Increased yield for all types of collection
- Increased resource output
- Improved action recovery speed
- Improved research speed
5. New battle levels
- Campaign level was raised to 60
6. Falcon reward mechanics modified
- Rewards are no longer received by email but directly added. The rewards are added directly to the backpack and can be viewed there.
7. Optimization of chat interface
8. Voice-over update for officers

1. Adjusted rules for Ghost Rebels event
- After the event is scheduled to start, players who cannot participate in it because of teleporting or joining the Guild now can take part in it.
- During the event period, each player can only participate it once with his ID. Final rankings and rewards will be based on the Guild that player got the points
- Adjusted the waiting time of Rebels' attack
2. Available to turn on/off VIP icon in Officer interface
3. Optimized the refresh issue in Leaderboard

1. Adjusted rules for Ghost Rebels event
- After the event is scheduled to start, players who cannot participate in it because of teleporting or joining the Guild now can take part in it.
- During the event period, each player can only participate it once with his ID. Final rankings and rewards will be based on the Guild that player got the points
- Adjusted the waiting time of Rebels' attack
2. Available to turn on/off VIP icon in Officer interface
3. Optimized the refresh issue in Leaderboard

1. New building added: Defense Turret
- Defend your base from enemies, by attacking the opponents' troops!
2. Guild Resource Mine added: Guild Supply Station
- R4 and higher Officials in a Guild, can build the Guild Supply Station within the Guild territories.
3. A strong new Officer has been added: Heleny
4. An Officer's Talent will now take effect when a 5-Star Officer is appointed as Junior Officer.
5. When the server is over 60 days active, a single attack can be initiated on Pandora's Division.
6. Fixed an issue regarding Evelyn's HP level restoration, while garrisoning Guild buildings.

1. New building added: Defense Turret
- Defend your base from enemies, by attacking the opponents' troops!
2. Guild Resource Mine added: Guild Supply Station
- R4 and higher Officials in a Guild, can build the Guild Supply Station within the Guild territories.
3. A strong new Officer has been added: Heleny
4. An Officer's Talent will now take effect when a 5-Star Officer is appointed as Junior Officer.
5. When the server is over 60 days active, a single attack can be initiated on Pandora's Division.
6. Fixed an issue regarding Evelyn's HP level restoration, while garrisoning Guild buildings.

1. Additional resources are available for collection.
2. New building: Archive
3. Added chat bubbles
4. For war zones over 4 months the daily specials will be split into two choices.
5. Time displayed in the report of the chat channel
6. Improved strength of T5 units

1. Additional resources are available for collection.
2. New building: Archive
3. Added chat bubbles
4. For war zones over 4 months the daily specials will be split into two choices.
5. Time displayed in the report of the chat channel
6. Improved strength of T5 units

1. New country added in country selection: United Kingdom
2. VIP level increased to 17
3. Increased number of participants for Raiders of the Treasure.
4. Added emojis
5. New base nameplate
6. New hero training system
7. Added the option to select all units to attack the same target.
8. Added a buff effect as long as you have the main city decoration.
9. R4 and R5 guild members can kick players who are building an alliance building.
10. Changed calculation of seriously injured units that died from end of the battle to the end of round.
11. Adjusted the ratio of serious injuries in combat.
12. Added feedback effect during HQ upgrade.
13. Optimization for detailed HQ information
14. AOE attacks while in Warmonger state

1. Improved security for transferring the Guild Leader position: the Guild Leader position can only be transferred to players with bound accounts.
2. Fixed some other known bugs.
3. Improved some UI display effects.

1. Improved security for transferring the Guild Leader position: the Guild Leader position can only be transferred to players with bound accounts.
2. Fixed some other known bugs.
3. Improved some UI display effects.

1.Reduced the output ratio of Stamina potions in Guild Chests.
2. Modified the rules for earning points by promoting units during the event. Promoting units now earns slightly fewer points that producing units.
3.Adjusted the number of Towers at each stage of Biozone: Counterattack.
4.Adjusted the Bio Cash output for each territory level in Biozone: Counterattack.
5.Improved the matchmaking algorithm in Raiders of the Treasure.

1.Reduced the output ratio of Stamina potions in Guild Chests.
2. Modified the rules for earning points by promoting units during the event. Promoting units now earns slightly fewer points that producing units.
3.Adjusted the number of Towers at each stage of Biozone: Counterattack.
4.Adjusted the Bio Cash output for each territory level in Biozone: Counterattack.
5.Improved the matchmaking algorithm in Raiders of the Treasure.

1. Battleship system added: provides artillery support during battle, as well as a variety of powerful technology bonuses.
2. When attempting to participate in a rally, Action Points for March Queues that did not join in time will be returned after the battle ends.
3.Improved some game text.
4.World map font improvements

1. Battleship system added: provides artillery support during battle, as well as a variety of powerful technology bonuses.
2. When attempting to participate in a rally, Action Points for March Queues that did not join in time will be returned after the battle ends.
3.Improved some game text.
4.World map font improvements

1. All-new gameplay Biozone: Counterattack is coming soon!
- Newly-designed Biozone Battle Pass, with even better rewards;
- Occupy Siege Turrets and use their artillery to attack opponents;
- Occupy Biochem Labs to earn tons of XP, and defeat their defenders to earn plentiful loot.
2. Biozone: Counterattack features all-new background music—hurry and experience the heat and wildness of the west!
3. We have provided additional purchase-able Action Point recovery items for when you've used up your Action Points and can't wait for them to recover on their own.
4. Boost information can now be viewed in Battle Reports shared via chat.

1. All-new gameplay Biozone: Counterattack is coming soon!
- Newly-designed Biozone Battle Pass, with even better rewards;
- Occupy Siege Turrets and use their artillery to attack opponents;
- Occupy Biochem Labs to earn tons of XP, and defeat their defenders to earn plentiful loot.
2. Biozone: Counterattack features all-new background music—hurry and experience the heat and wildness of the west!
3. We have provided additional purchase-able Action Point recovery items for when you've used up your Action Points and can't wait for them to recover on their own.
4. Boost information can now be viewed in Battle Reports shared via chat.

1. New Biozone Leaderboard: Records the history of the Biozone and displays it in the form of leaderboard rankings.
2. Added a new quick-use feature to use all resource items quickly.
3. Commanders can now interact even more with Officers Dorothea, Abigail, and Ophelia in the Officer's Club!
4. Improved the display of mail that informs players that they've been scouted.
5. Improved the user experience for using Base Decorations.
6. Improved the player experience of the Guild Mobilization event

1. New Biozone Leaderboard: Records the history of the Biozone and displays it in the form of leaderboard rankings.
2. Added a new quick-use feature to use all resource items quickly.
3. Commanders can now interact even more with Officers Dorothea, Abigail, and Ophelia in the Officer's Club!
4. Improved the display of mail that informs players that they've been scouted.
5. Improved the user experience for using Base Decorations.
6. Improved the player experience of the Guild Mobilization event

1. Scout Reports can now be shared with your Guild members.
2. New Governor Skill - Electromagnetic Blockade: confine all player bases within a certain area. Bases will be unable to teleport for 10 minutes.
3. Optimized certain UI display effects of the Warship system.
4. Balance adjustment: Tank Destroyer talent enhanced
- max Tank Destroyer Attack increased from 5% to 10%
- max Tank Destroyer Health increased from 5% to 10%
- Tank Destroyer Mastery's Attack, Defense, and Health all increased from 3% to 5%

1. Scout Reports can now be shared with your Guild members.
2. New Governor Skill - Electromagnetic Blockade: confine all player bases within a certain area. Bases will be unable to teleport for 10 minutes.
3. Optimized certain UI display effects of the Warship system.
4. Balance adjustment: Tank Destroyer talent enhanced
- max Tank Destroyer Attack increased from 5% to 10%
- max Tank Destroyer Health increased from 5% to 10%
- Tank Destroyer Mastery's Attack, Defense, and Health all increased from 3% to 5%

1. Chinese Officer "Ling" makes her debut.
2. Brand new Guild Skills: a series of skills that enhances power of the entire Guild.
3. Commanders can tap the fast forward button in Arenas and cross-server Arenas to end the battle quickly.
4. Optimized the black market exchange function in Stage 3 of "Biozone: Counterattack." Commanders can now exchange for needed resources more quickly.

1. Chinese Officer "Ling" makes her debut.
2. Brand new Guild Skills: a series of skills that enhances power of the entire Guild.
3. Commanders can tap the fast forward button in Arenas and cross-server Arenas to end the battle quickly.
4. Optimized the black market exchange function in Stage 3 of "Biozone: Counterattack." Commanders can now exchange for needed resources more quickly.

1. Guild Skill now available - Territory Slowdown, use this skill to multiply the March Time of other Guilds' Troops marching on your Guild's territory.
2. Guild Skill now available - Turning Point, use this skill to instantly generate a temporary Guild Fort on the map. The Fort does not require any construction.
3. Optimized the animation effects of releasing Warship skills.
4. The global bonus of Officer Outfits will take effect even if the corresponding Officer has not been acquired
5. New customer service access button added to the Notice Board.
6. Fixed bug: Officer outfit's troop capacity buff failing to take effect in Normandy Arena and Operation Overlord.
7. Fixed bug: Warship skill range inconsistent with display effects.

1. Guild Skill now available - Territory Slowdown, use this skill to multiply the March Time of other Guilds' Troops marching on your Guild's territory.
2. Guild Skill now available - Turning Point, use this skill to instantly generate a temporary Guild Fort on the map. The Fort does not require any construction.
3. Optimized the animation effects of releasing Warship skills.
4. The global bonus of Officer Outfits will take effect even if the corresponding Officer has not been acquired
5. New customer service access button added to the Notice Board.
6. Fixed bug: Officer outfit's troop capacity buff failing to take effect in Normandy Arena and Operation Overlord.
7. Fixed bug: Warship skill range inconsistent with display effects.

1. Christmas is nearly here! Come take a look inside the all-new Christmas Base!
2. Join a guild to unlock a series of exclusive missions. Complete those missions to earn tons of Gold and speedup items.
3. Improved the display of Officers in the Officer interaction interface.
4. Use multiple training expansion items at the same time, making it easier to train troops multiple times in a row.
5. When a target enters or exits a resource point while being attacked, the attacker's attacks will no longer be interrupted—they will not leave battle.

1. Christmas is nearly here! Come take a look inside the all-new Christmas Base!
2. Join a guild to unlock a series of exclusive missions. Complete those missions to earn tons of Gold and speedup items.
3. Improved the display of Officers in the Officer interaction interface.
4. Use multiple training expansion items at the same time, making it easier to train troops multiple times in a row.
5. When a target enters or exits a resource point while being attacked, the attacker's attacks will no longer be interrupted—they will not leave battle.

1.Commanders can now share a page that shows which Officers they've gotten and invite friends to battle together!
2.Improved some game text.
3.World map font improvements.
4.Improved server response speeds.

1.Commanders can now share a page that shows which Officers they've gotten and invite friends to battle together!
2.Improved some game text.
3.World map font improvements.
4.Improved server response speeds.

1. New Base Conquest feature: After a successful attack on an enemy base, Commanders can now leave their unique mark!
2. Now you can share your Officers to get great rewards!
3. When attacking other players, you can now choose to "hold position after attacking".
4. The matchmaking system for Raiders of the Treasure has been improved to take into account each Commander's Power.

1. New Base Conquest feature: After a successful attack on an enemy base, Commanders can now leave their unique mark!
2. Now you can share your Officers to get great rewards!
3. When attacking other players, you can now choose to "hold position after attacking".
4. The matchmaking system for Raiders of the Treasure has been improved to take into account each Commander's Power.

1. We've prepared a special gift for every Commander—the Kiss of War Yearly Review.
2. Added a new Recovery Center to the Biozone. After the Biozone event ends, you can recover a certain proportion of the units lost in the Biozone at the Recovery Center. Come and recruit even more troops to welcome in the next round of battle!
3. Adjusted the matchmaking system for the Biozone to take into account the combat capability of each Commander.
4. The progress of Warship modifications and upgrades can now be viewed from the overview interface.
5. Officer Training no longer requires completing certain Zone News criteria.
6. In order to ensure the fairness of the matchmaking in the Biozone, and to prevent Power mismatches due to players from transferring servers after matchmaking is completed, players can no longer teleport into servers that are in the warm-up phase of the Biozone event.
7. Improved the Power display in the Barracks. Now you can view the true combat capability of each unit type to understand the real strength of your forces.

1. We've prepared a special gift for every Commander—the Kiss of War Yearly Review.
2. Added a new Recovery Center to the Biozone. After the Biozone event ends, you can recover a certain proportion of the units lost in the Biozone at the Recovery Center. Come and recruit even more troops to welcome in the next round of battle!
3. Adjusted the matchmaking system for the Biozone to take into account the combat capability of each Commander.
4. The progress of Warship modifications and upgrades can now be viewed from the overview interface.
5. Officer Training no longer requires completing certain Zone News criteria.
6. In order to ensure the fairness of the matchmaking in the Biozone, and to prevent Power mismatches due to players from transferring servers after matchmaking is completed, players can no longer teleport into servers that are in the warm-up phase of the Biozone event.
7. Improved the Power display in the Barracks. Now you can view the true combat capability of each unit type to understand the real strength of your forces.

1. A wise and beautiful Officer from Japan, Sakura, would like to meet you all!
2. For Rally Attacks that you cannot join, the "Join" button will be hidden.

1. A wise and beautiful Officer from Japan, Sakura, would like to meet you all!
2. For Rally Attacks that you cannot join, the "Join" button will be hidden.

1. You can now use 4 characters for your Guild abbreviation!
2. Improved some tips during the beginner's tutorial.

1. You can now use 4 characters for your Guild abbreviation!
2. Improved some tips during the beginner's tutorial.

1. New Officer Lounge feature: Decorate your own room to create a unique space where your Officers can relax, then interact with your Officers there to learn more about their background stories and create wonderful memories together!
2. New Officer interface background: Frozen Frontline.
3. You can now share your "Conqueror's Glory" with other Commanders in your Zone or Guild.
4. When attacking Pandora units solo, you can now choose to "hold position after attacking".
5. R4 and R5 Officials can now change the Leader of troops garrisoning Cities and territory.

1. New Officer Lounge feature: Decorate your own room to create a unique space where your Officers can relax, then interact with your Officers there to learn more about their background stories and create wonderful memories together!
2. New Officer interface background: Frozen Frontline.
3. You can now share your "Conqueror's Glory" with other Commanders in your Zone or Guild.
4. When attacking Pandora units solo, you can now choose to "hold position after attacking".
5. R4 and R5 Officials can now change the Leader of troops garrisoning Cities and territory.

1. Attention! This is not an exercise! An all-new weapon system is now online! Equip different weapons to give Officers extra skills and attributes. Hurry to get yourself fully armed so you can handle any enemy with ease!
2. Improved the Guild Mobilization event experience. Reduced the amount of Gold required to buy mission chances. Added new features such as allowing R4 and R5 Officials to query mission claiming histories.
3. When viewing troop boosts in the Battle Report, there is now a "City Boosts" category. City Boosts will no longer be calculated inside the "Other" category.
4. Adjusted some of Sakura's skills.

1. Attention! This is not an exercise! An all-new weapon system is now online! Equip different weapons to give Officers extra skills and attributes. Hurry to get yourself fully armed so you can handle any enemy with ease!
2. Improved the Guild Mobilization event experience. Reduced the amount of Gold required to buy mission chances. Added new features such as allowing R4 and R5 Officials to query mission claiming histories.
3. When viewing troop boosts in the Battle Report, there is now a "City Boosts" category. City Boosts will no longer be calculated inside the "Other" category.
4. Adjusted some of Sakura's skills.

1. Added new sound effects for Officer actions in the Officer interface to improve the audio-visual experience of the game.
2. Added a "like" feature to the Conquering system: Commanders can now go to the Conquering interface and "like" the Conquering results of other Commanders!
3. Improved the limiting mechanism for maximum Rally and Garrison capacities.
4. Are you frustrated trying to find game strategies online? We've got a new Game Assistant feature just for you! It's full of all kinds of strategy guides!
5. Lilith's Skill 2 can now take effect in the Arena.
6. The Springfield's weapon skill can now take effect in the Arena. Fixed a bug in which the Springfield could take effect in the wrong scenarios.

3. Improved the limiting mechanism for maximum Rally and Garrison capacities.
4. Are you frustrated trying to find game strategies online? We've got a new Game Assistant feature just for you! It's full of all kinds of strategy guides!
5. Lilith's Skill 2 can now take effect in the Arena.
6. The Springfield's weapon skill can now take effect in the Arena. Fixed a bug in which the Springfield could take effect in the wrong scenarios.

6. The Springfield's weapon skill can now take effect in the Arena. Fixed a bug in which the Springfield could take effect in the wrong scenarios.

1. New content in Officer Lounge: New Officer Wardrobe - now Officers can change into Nightdresses. Updated 3 Officers: Doireann, Jeanne, and Sakura and their background story dialogues.
2. The long-awaited Peace Shields have started to arrive at the Railway Station! Peace Shields can now be bought at the Railway Station.
3. New "Journey Boost" pack, which updates every week.
4. Cooldown time added to burning status for Guild buildings. The fire can be extinguished only after the cooldown ends.
5. For players who applied for a refund, the items will be deducted. If the items have already been used, then the corresponding amount of Gold will be deducted.
6. Improved the Officer interface overall, and added an Officer sorting feature. You can now choose a sorting method to sort your Officers.
